website_summaries.verdict: Simple bleach tablets that have a low price and are easy to use and effective.
pros: Does an excellent job of eliminating bacteria in the bowl for a sanitized environment
Over time, it will remove tough stains from the bowl
Has a pleasing scent, so it will deodorize the toilet too
cons: Single tablet may only last about 6 weeks, so you will have to replace it regularly

customer_reviews.title: DANGER !!! STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.text: These tablets almost destroyed all my 5 toilets. It is eating out all rubber seals inside the toilets in addition to terrible smell of chlorine in all restrooms. Safe yourself. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Domorad

customer_reviews.title: Great for my toilets..
customer_reviews.text: I have Very Hard Water and these are the only tablets that help with the ring that forms in the toilets .. Have tried everything to no avail... Thank you for carrying them.. Used to purchase at Costco but they only carry them every so often... Thank You, Darlene Bennett
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Works great and lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were less expensive, but I will always pay because these WORK. They last up to 3-4 months and your toilet has zero rings or stains the whole time. It’s so easy to just throw it in the tank and let it do it’s job. The best part? It will even get rid of existing rings/stains. I haven’t scrubbed my toilet in more than a year because of this product! I couldn’t recommend more!
customer_reviews.author: ZJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful for keeping the toilet clean between cleanings. Also eliminated hard to clean rings from hard water! Will be used regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, but Walmart stopped selling it, even a pack of two. They sell it with some blue stuff and it doesn’t work for our hard water. This is the only one I like.
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: It smells clean.............
customer_reviews.text: These Clorox Drop-Ins do a great job keeping our toilets clean. It lasts for weeks and weeks depending on how often you flush. I know it is working because I can smell the chlorine in the water filling the bowl. BE CAREFUL - do not use this product where children and/or pets might come in contact with it.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyPetLady

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Several tablets in the package arrived chipped so do not recommend ordering on-line. I use the Clorox tabs regularly and find that they are a great product and work as promoted - my review applies to the shipping and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A Real Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: These are the mini tablets that you could get at the dollar store. Such a disappointment for the price paid. A real rip off !!! Also mom refundable
customer_reviews.author: Erika D

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Horribly strong smelling product. Will make your whole house smell of bleach. These tablets can also do damage to your plastic flushing mechanisms. Amazon denied the return. Don't get this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product if you have children; or a dog. It's far too potent/toxic. It produces mild but noticeable fumes, which can likely induce dizziness if a person's confined in a bathroom long enough. Surprising this thing is designed for home use. I fished it out of the tank and threw it away, along with the rest of the unused box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They will sometimes get caught in your flusher mechanism
customer_reviews.text: They will sometimes get caught in your flusher mechanism! You then have to get into your water storage bow , reach in with your hand, and get it unstuck from the water-trap! They DO help keep water clean, but the fact that it moves around while flushing, ultimately stopping up the water trap, it negates any usefulness where this home is concerned. There might something better....I'll be trying other products.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G.

customer_reviews.title: Package problem
customer_reviews.text: These are very good tablets. I went to Amazon because out local grocery store did not have them when I wanted to get them. The delivery time was fine. My problem has been that the tablets are broken and somewhat crushed. I just dropped one into the tank and it was in several pieces and much of it was ground up. I will take a chance and order them again. I will take them out of the box and if any are broken up they will go back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O.

customer_reviews.title: Removes black hard water grime
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 other automatic toilet tablets/gels as well as scrubbing daily and none of them have been able to remove or prevent the black substance that accumulates from the hard water when the guest toilet hasn't been flushed for a couple days. In a matter of a couple weeks this one has completely removed what was there without any scrubbing, i was shocked. It has a slight chlorine smell right when you flush but absolutely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Hubb

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work well
customer_reviews.text: These do seem to keep the toilet clean between actual cleanings, so that is good. AS for the scent? Well they smell like bleach and you get a whiff of it every time you flush. If that bothers you, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: It’s o
customer_reviews.text: They were super easy to put in, and I do feel like the toilet is whiter and cleaner and you can still smell the Clorox product after awhile. I wouldn’t say it’s amazing or ground breaking, you will still need to purchase a toilet bowl cleaner and clean, I don’t really see the benefit of this especially for the price. You are better off investing in a good toilet bowl cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Anum

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bowl clean
customer_reviews.text: These white tablets keep the toilet bowl clean for at least a month, I haven’t kept track exactly, but it’s been at least 4 weeks, maybe longer. I been using these for years and they haven’t damaged the inner workings of my toilet. Yes, you can smell a faint bleach scent, but it dissipates quickly. I don’t like the blue tablets, who wants to see green water!?
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Smell too strong
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this one because it smells so awful—very strong bleech. Want to return it immediately but since i already used one. So i just kept it. Will not recommend buying it unless u like strong bleech smell
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found it!
customer_reviews.text: Funny how you don't appreciate something until you can't find it any more. Along with so many other things missing from grocery shelves...this was too. I was glad to be able to get the six tablet box, to share with my Mother. Came quickly and securely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: txpauline

customer_reviews.title: When you have little boys, you want your bathroom to smell like a swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: These Clorox tabs go into your toilet's tank and each flush lets out a slight bleach smell that will remind you of a well maintained swimming pool. They keep the toilet bowl clean, and I appreciate the disinfecting action when the boy clog things up.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only things that keep black hard water rings from forming in my toilet bowl, nothing else has worked . I only hope they’re not too harmful to the parts inside the tank, as a few reviews have claimed. Time will tell, but for now they’re doing the job well!
customer_reviews.author: charlesjacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Clorox Automatic bowl cleaner-no hands required being discontinued????
customer_reviews.text: I use it in each commode toilet tank! Keeps bowl clean & sanitized for 3 months, just as advertised! Have always been satisfied with this product. No hassles. Are they discontinuing this product because it worked great or what????
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mayson

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but shame on you price gouging at its worst . $25.00 for 6 tablets. Discusting
customer_reviews.author: sicilianmom

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, smells good, is good!
customer_reviews.text: The seller and the delivery was great. I like this product to help keep the toilet sanitary, clean looking, and smelling clean. I much prefer the white/clear tabs over the blue due to unwanted staining.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Bleach tabs! Works great! Cleans well!! No issues! Would recommend! I know they aren’t great on your rubber seals on the tank but you can replace that so I thought it was worth it to risk it.
customer_reviews.author: kitty20

customer_reviews.title: Great Clorox product I’ve used for years.
customer_reviews.text: Clorox bleach tablets are really helpful. I don’t have to clean the toliet as often, as they really prevent buildup. Sometimes hard to find them in the store, so the six pack was a great find.
customer_reviews.author: tess thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is a must product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper product that was a joke. Didn't work and so went back to the Clorox product that we knew would work. Stay away from the cheap brands and go with the well known one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Doty Girl

customer_reviews.title: They break in transit, but they still work,
customer_reviews.text: Eliminates rust stains and rings, lasts for 2-3 months, no problems. They’re higher priced than I would like but there’s no alternative. They don’t travel well so count on several being broken if purchased on line.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Banks Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Selling shattered tablets.
customer_reviews.text: Tablets were shattered inside packaging when received. I'm sure this will shorten the life of the treatment. This was packaged fairly well when shipped. I believe the tablets were bad prior to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: you can usually count on Clorox for cleaning products. Doesn't smell like bleach, more like really freshwater.
customer_reviews.author: B Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Clean
customer_reviews.text: We tried the "Blue" ones but did not like them. These produce clear water in the toilet . They have a slight chorine smell that might offend the very sensitive but with the lid down, no odor.
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: Clorox Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablet - 3.5 Ounce, 6 Pack
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are very good for keeping the toilets sanitary and helpful for homes where there is a hard water situation. I use them, and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tshop123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Effective
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for years. We live in the South where mold grows in the toilet overnight. With them, we eradicate that issue. Without them, black toilets!
customer_reviews.author: Krullstone LLC

customer_reviews.title: wish it was blue in color
customer_reviews.text: wish i could smell chlorine OR saw the blue color when flushing to confirm its existence. kind of disappointed as i don't know if it's actually working.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hou

customer_reviews.title: All the tablets where crumbled
customer_reviews.text: All of the tablets where broken/ crumbled in the box. I did contact seller. So will update. I have enjoyed this product in the past when they are all together!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Block

customer_reviews.title: Good product, came crushed up sadly.
customer_reviews.text: We always use these and love them. Sadly they came all crushed up so I’m not sure how well they will work or how long they will last. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: GaffMom

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this. Seems too keep my toilet bowl cleaner longer than before. It does give off a slight smell of bleach. Just be careful where you place it in the tank as it could get caught on the stopper and make your toilet run.
customer_reviews.author: acook1432

customer_reviews.title: Took the rings way
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with how well these work. We used to get dark rings with in days after cleaning the toilet. Now we go weeks with a spotless bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This product keeps the inside of the commode clean.
customer_reviews.text: Throw one of these tablets into the tank of your clean commode, and your toilet bowl will stay clean for three months, with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Wish I had discovered this product many moons ago. A bit pricey compared with generics available at our local groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin R. Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Killing Bacteria with Malice
customer_reviews.text: It's you... or them. When you are faced with a bowl teeming with bacteria and you have a burning compulsion to kill 99.9% of them, chose the nuclear option from our friends at Clorox. You may wonder why... why doesn't it kill 100% of them. You know why. You have to leave a few alive to tell the others what happened in your bowl so they don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Dave-azon

customer_reviews.title: messy white powders
customer_reviews.text: when I open the bag, there is powders everywhere in my hand. And those white powder seems very corrosive. Be careful to handle this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it clean
customer_reviews.text: Nothing complain about. Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my toilets, clean with a not too noticeable scent that I think is just right and the water stays clear....I hate the blue water products!
customer_reviews.author: patricia g

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the blue colored ones. They stain blue any rust our hard water deposits making it unsightly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Lahr

customer_reviews.title: Clorox toilet tab dust!
customer_reviews.text: Every single Clorox toilet tab in every single packet was crushed and complete dust! Not a a returnable item!! What an awful experience!! Should have more recourse than zero recourse. A lot of money flushed. I’d give less than 1 on product review if I could.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth allen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your toilet bowl clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a water softener system in my house and it takes out all the chlorine in the water. This tablet helps keep chlorine in my toilet to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Toilet clean and easy to put in tank
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works well in keeping toilet clean and fresh
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Possum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years, great product, each tablet comes individually wrapped, easy to store & use.
customer_reviews.author: Ron The Artiste'

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorated package
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken, after days waiting for This I received the package deteriorated y the capsules were broken
customer_reviews.author: EFJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Strong, gross smell of bleach mixed with toilet water. Toilet bowl still got dirty. Hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Ct

customer_reviews.title: Keep you toilet clean and germ free.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Best part, no color. They keep the toilet fresh for 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tabs smashed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12 of these. They arrived smashed. Each tab in pieces. They cannot be returned. Order locally!
customer_reviews.author: NFP

customer_reviews.title: the cleanest toilet ever
customer_reviews.text: this is easy to use and keeps your toilet smelling fresh and looking clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for years. This is a good deal for them. These are one of those things that are necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Angel of the Springs

customer_reviews.title: They aren't cheap but to clean the toilets
customer_reviews.text: Finally a bright clean toilet. I really like these, so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Manring

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use these for several years and they do a great job of keeping the ball clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tatom

customer_reviews.title: Will not order online
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Received order and two of the tabs were broken into small pieces. Will purchase in store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Deodorizer but Rust in Tank
customer_reviews.text: I have two young children that often forget to flush so these drop ins have been great with deodorizing and keeping the toilet clean between bathroom cleanings. Unfortunately I will have to stop using them bc they cause the metal inside the toilet tank to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: it works really well to keep the algie out of my toilet
customer_reviews.text: I just drop one in the toilet and it keeps anything from building up inside.
customer_reviews.author: magruder

customer_reviews.title: Arrived crumbled
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using these; it's hard to find ones that do not color the water blue. However, about half of them arrived crumbled; I've used them any but am assuming that will impact how well they work/how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. makes toilet bowl cleaning easier.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Simple but a lot of breakage of the tablets in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Fatgumby

customer_reviews.title: Works well....keeping the bowl clean.
customer_reviews.text: Use in the toilet tank...keep the bowl real clean w/o brush so often.....smell CLEAN too.
customer_reviews.author: bmysulmat

customer_reviews.title: Saves me between cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It makes my life easier with cleaning, especially with boys.
customer_reviews.author: ecmomma

customer_reviews.title: Clean, clean clean!
customer_reviews.text: A great product for cleansing and killing germs! A must for every toilet tank!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the toilet bowl clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it keeps the toilet bowl and tank clean . . but I do think it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrely

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well nice sent
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a clean sent all the time in the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: SL77Free

customer_reviews.title: Keep your bowl clean & white.
customer_reviews.text: If you have hard water and usually have a dirty "ring" in your toilet, these get rid of it and keeps your bowl white! If you do not care for the smell of bleach, you may not like these.
customer_reviews.author: Verna

customer_reviews.title: Clean and clear
customer_reviews.text: Releases a slight clean bleach smell after flushes which lets me know it’s working. Bowl is usually clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bootsie

customer_reviews.title: Clorox Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablet - 3.5 Ounce, 6 Pack
customer_reviews.text: I love these tablets. They keep the toilet bowl clean and smelling fresh and sanitized.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Mims

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. Most of the tablets are broken. When I first opened it it smelled so badly, but at least the smell was of chlorine so I thought it would do it's job. However, this is a total disappointment, no effect at all. Don't buy this if you don't want to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Harutyunyan

customer_reviews.title: Stain removal
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect this to work so well, purchased to help keep a toilet clean that keeps getting stained and wouldnt get clean no matter how much I scrubbed, after about a week all the stains were gone. There is a strong bleach smell so just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael s.

customer_reviews.title: lasts about 8 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Works well but def does not last 3 months. Mine completely disintegrated by 2 months
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: It does so far seem to keep the fungus down, which is why I bought it, but it does seem overly pricey for 6 little puck-size toilet reservoir pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Chet A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. However, all were crushed due to poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: L. Isa

customer_reviews.title: Toilet tablets
customer_reviews.text: Great value. These things cost a lot of money in the grocery store for just a two pack.
customer_reviews.author: jbrain

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your toilet clean
customer_reviews.text: Good product!! I’m all for keeping my toilet clean and eliminate germs.
customer_reviews.author: Neicy

customer_reviews.title: Shipment box needs to be thicker
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the tablets work fine, I've used them before, but they came in envelope packaging and the tablets are almost all split in half. I'll order my next batch from another vendor or buy them in store
customer_reviews.author: Mallory C.

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get in stores
customer_reviews.text: Prefer this to the blue drop in ones they have in the stores now. Helps keep toilet clean between full cleaning. A little pricy during the pandemic but prefer this product.
customer_reviews.author: m jost

customer_reviews.title: Removes odor well
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smells like bleach, but eliminatedvtge urine smell from bathroom. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great! Make sure open your bathroom window once awhile.
customer_reviews.text: Never wash my toilet bowl again. But it makes the restroom smells like bleach though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Yuen

customer_reviews.title: Germaphobes would buy this without a doubt!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there’s a bleach smell when flushing. However, my guests automatically feel that the bathroom is clean. 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: All broken
customer_reviews.text: All tablets were broken, so a bit disappointed by that, though all were still useable even though crumbled.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A Yaeger

customer_reviews.title: Product not useable
customer_reviews.text: All six tablets arrived in crushed condition and are useless. I am seeking a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Destroys toilets
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are highly corrosive ("DANGER: Highly corrosive" is written on the package.) Without much use they will destroy parts of your toilet and your big repairs will be needed. The tablets are non-returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Edmonds Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great value when buying in bulk
customer_reviews.text: When I don’t use these tablets, I have to clean my toilets every few days. They’re easy to drop in and smell nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tablets arrived badly broken
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, packaging could be better. By the time it arrived, all of the tablets were broken to the point they were practically powder. As soon as I opened the box, powder went all over the table and floor. Opening that actual packaging was worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than they used to be. It’s like chocolate bars. Same package, same price smaller product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Parker

customer_reviews.title: Will not do the job as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened the box to use one of the tablets to find they are all 6 in pieces. Should put "HANDLE WITH CARE" on the box. I will see about returning this mess tomorrow, Monday 09/14!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Kuchrawy

customer_reviews.title: Great product if they arrive unbroken!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to disinfect toilet....when they are in one piece...Mine arrived broken into a thousand small pieces....I am going to order again with the hope that the shipper will use a more sustainable package...They are expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: They do the job and keep the bowl looking very clean.
customer_reviews.author: S Benner

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true.
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on these to freshen up the bathroom, and Amazon's lower prices make this a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up in the middle of my sidewalk in the entrance way and when i opened it up they were all broken in pieces. Everyone of them!!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Stay away--at least half crushed to smithereens
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the latest reviews: Like others recently, half of the tablets were so badly crushed, they were entirely unusable. Box was intact. The issue was inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Tablets arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: The individual tablets were all cracked and some were powdered. Because this product has harmful chemicals, pouring the crushed tablet with the dust floating seems dangerous. Unfortunately there are no returns for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Young

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The box containing tablets was damaged, tablets were broken, product was pricey, now won’t work as well when in pieces. The tablets work well if in one piece!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the toilet doesn't need cleaning as often with the use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Broken tablets
customer_reviews.text: 5 out of 6 of the tablets are broken into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: eileen rivas

customer_reviews.title: Better than blue and white clorox drops
customer_reviews.text: Like these better than the blue and white clorox drops
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Better Unit Price + Immediate Shipment
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to COVID-19 this item became hard to find in local grocery stores. I love this product and was so happy to see it’s readily available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Clorox Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablet - 3.5 Ounce, 6 Pack
product_meta.description: Clorox Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner tablet cleans and deodorizes with the power of bleach and kills 99.9% of household bacteria in the toilet bowl water. Each tablet sanitizes the toilet bowl water in 5 minutes, cleans for up to 3 months and helps prevent tough hard water, mineral and lime scale stains. These easy to us toilet tablets keep your toilet smelling fresh and sparkling clean with every flush, leaving bowl water crystal clear. To sanitize, cleand and deodorize, simply drop a tablet in the toilet tank and let it do its work. The tablet does not harm the septic tank. With Clorox, you know your toilet bowl is clean and disinfected.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,312 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
